Disease.Name: HOMOCARNOSINOSIS
Disease.Summary: very rare ;autosomal recessive;Serum carnosinase deficiency and homocarnosinosis are probably the same disorder. ;Homocarnosinosis; is still a biochemical aberration with unknown clinical significance [Sjasstad O et al., 2018]
